translations: v．撤回，放弃（信仰、观点等）：公开声明放弃或不再坚持先前的信仰、观点或声明。

sentences.sentence: Zawahiri has alleged that his former comrade was tortured into recanting.
sentences.translation: 扎瓦·希里宣称他的前战友是被屈打成招的。

sentences.sentence: Recently, Hawking, who has no qualms about recanting his own work if he decides he was wrong, may have transcended his famous proof that singularities exist.
sentences.translation: 最近，哈肯没有考虑放弃他的工作，如果他认为他是错的，可能已经超越他的著名的关于非凡现象存在的证据。
